TopicTitle: Sweet'n Crazy Industries! "We Make Cupcakes With Worms In 'Em!"

Articles.Content: Striving to make new plane parts for people! Run by Twinky827 (Textures) and Sss (Modelling).

Cool!

Ill make some when i get the time.
For fun I made you a higher quality banner if you want one. http://imgur.com/jMWP1

Ok, i got a part.

its, its, A... PILLOW!!! 8)

Does your spaceplane like to crash? this pillow is for you! nearly indestructable!

I havent tried it out in game due to very laggy computer. it needs a texture, and it dosent look very good, but remeber, this is my first part.
I downloaded the part to test, it says that its 0 kB and once you open it, it will say its a corrupt file or is damaged.

Hmm...

WEIRD.

ill try re-uloading.

oops, i must not have put the files in i guess!

well, try it now.
I was thinking something like this as the pillows... which would have a plate underneath and they would be paracutes that would look like airbags

May I give you a few wing concepts?

If it doesn\'t open, right-click and open in new tab.

May I give you a few wing concepts?

If it doesn\'t open, right-click and open in new tab.

Sure, but um, ill have to learn that first. also onyx, can you send me a picture of it in game? because i have a crappy pc, so i cant play KSP.

So... It\'s just the testcube from the stickied tutorial with an insanely high max temp and impact tolerance?

EDIT: I did a test with this part:

Launching:

Decoupling booster:

Falling back down to Kerbin:

And lo and behold, it survived! Oh, wait, never mind:

Not even the pillow survived the crash.

So... It\'s just the testcube from the stickied tutorial with an insanely high max temp and impact tolerance?

I think it\'s meant to make landing a heavy lander easier, in the same way that one mars lander concept works. But, seriously? The testcube?

Don\'t stoop that low, if you want I can help you with this.
